zh: 这个花园里种植着各种各样的植物。

en: This ruler has the scale in millimeters.
zh: 这把尺子上有毫米刻度。

en: I need to escape from this decree.
zh: 我需要摆脱这项法令。

en: Take a no. 5 bus at this bus stop.
zh: 在这个公交车站乘坐5路公交车。

en: We all hope that this cease-fire will make for world peace.
zh: 我们都希望这次停火能促进世界和平。

en: Walking along this street, I often see a friend of mine.
zh: 走在这条街上，我经常看到我的一个朋友。

en: Go two blocks and turn left.
zh: 走过两个街区然后左转。

en: Go straight down this street and turn right at the third light.
zh: 沿着这条街直走，在第三个红绿灯处右转。

en: It is very dangerous to cross this street.
zh: 穿过这条街非常危险。

en: Just go up this street for about 200 meters.
zh: 沿着这条街走大约200米就到了。

en: Go along this street and you'll come to the post office on the left.
zh: 沿着这条街走，你会看到邮局在左边。

en: Go down this street three blocks.
zh: 沿着这条街走三个街区。

en: Go two blocks along this street and turn left.
zh: 沿着这条街走两个街区，然后左转。

en: This street is clear of traffic at night.
zh: 这条街晚上没有车辆。

en: This street is lively.
zh: 这条街很热闹。

en: This street runs due north.
zh: 这条街朝正北方延伸。

en: There is a constant flow of traffic on this road.
zh: 这条路上车流量很大。

en: This avenue is wide but not very long.
zh: 这条大道很宽，但不是很长。

en: There is heavy traffic on this street.
zh: 这条街交通拥堵。

en: Traffic is heavy on this street.
zh: 这条街交通拥堵。

en: There is heavy traffic in this street.
zh: 这条街交通拥堵。

en: This road is too narrow for trucks to pass.
zh: 这条路太窄了，卡车无法通过。

en: How noisy this street is!
zh: 这条街真吵啊！

en: All the motels on this road are full.
zh: 这条路上的所有汽车旅馆都满了。

en: You must not park the car in this street.
zh: 你不能把车停在这条街上。

en: If you follow this street, you will get to the station.
zh: 如果你沿着这条街走，你就会到达车站。

en: Go along this street and turn right at the bank.
zh: 沿着这条街走，在银行右转。

en: Written in plain style, as it is, his paper is easy to read.
zh: 他的论文文风朴实，所以很容易读。

en: I need some medicine to kill the pain.
zh: 我需要一些止痛药。

en: I can't bear this pain.
zh: 我无法忍受这种疼痛。

en: I can't stand this pain any more.
zh: 我再也无法忍受这种疼痛了。

en: Can you obtain this rare book for me?
zh: 你能帮我弄到这本稀有的书吗？

en: How did you come by those rare books?
zh: 你是怎么得到这些稀有书籍的？

en: What do you call this bird?
zh: 这种鸟叫什么名字？

en: This bird cannot fly.
zh: 这只鸟不会飞。

en: This bird lives neither in Japan nor in China.
zh: 这种鸟既不住在日本，也不住在在中国。

en: This bird is in danger of dying out.
zh: 这种鸟有灭绝的危险。
